AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for iOS

-

AdGuard gets detected on a website

Chrome, Safari

Mobile

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

_No response_
